headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DREW, CHARLES EDWARD

snippet: DREW--Charles Edward, Jr. Charles Edward Drew Junior, a greatly loved teacher and prolific writer, passed away in Brooklyn, NY on March 11, 2016. He was born August 7, 1965 in Cleveland, OH and spent his adult life In New York City. He is survived by his loving mother Nancy Drew of Columbus, OH, brother Scott Drew, sister-in-law Kelli Drew, nieces Sabrina and Madelyn Drew and a wealth of friends, students, colleagues, collaborators and friends' children. He will be memorialized in New York City and Columbus. 1/3
